channel.title: How to make items equip in the right slot? [delta] 317
channel.description: So im trying to add vestas and statius to my private server and i gott the models and the ints but im having a problem.... When i wear my vestas chainbody, it equips it as a weapon.. So how do i fix it so it equips it as armour? PLEASE HELP! PLEASE HELP! PLEASE HELP! PLEASE HELP!

item.title: How to make items equip in the right slot? [delta] 317
item.dc:creator: @wurz1l wurz1l
item.description:
@wurz1l wrote:

open the file called item.java and put the item id in public static int body[]

same goes for all other items but under what it actually is, boots helm etc
